document.topic_text: KGW/Oregonian mayoral debate: What would you ask? KGW Staff , KGW 8:56 AM. PDT April 25, 2016 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST PORTLAND, Ore. -- KGW and The Oregonian are hosting a debate Monday night between the top two candidates for mayor of Portland. What would you ask Oregon State Treasurer Ted Wheeler or Multnomah County Commissioner Jules Bailey? Share questions in the comments, tweet @KGWPolitics with #pdxmayor or join the Facebook conversation. You could hear your question asked during the debate! How to watch: The debate will be live streamed on KGW.com and oregonlive.com from 7 p.m. to 8 p.m. Monday and KGW will live tweet the debate, so follow @KGWPolitics . You can also watch the debate on KGW-TV Tuesday night at 7 p.m. If you'd like to hear from other mayoral candidates, check out the online forum KGW hosted April 21. All of the candidates were invited and Sean Davis, Jules Bailey, David Schor, Patty Burkett and Jessie Sponberg answered questions from viewers on topics ranging from housing to homelessness to beer preference. Live Blog Portland mayoral candidate online forum hosted by KGW
